title: Make state operating appropriations for FY 2026-27
subject: Finance and Appropriations

actions.description: Refused to concur in Senate amendments
Insist on amendments; asks for committee of conference
Conference managers: Sens. - Cirino, Chavez, Hicks-Hudson
Conference managers: Reps. - Stewart, Dovilla, Sweeney

actions.description: Item passed notwithstanding objections of the Governor
Item passed notwithstanding objections of the Governor

Effective
					
					Operating appropriations effective June 30, 2025.  Other provisions generally effective September 30, 2025.  Some provisions subject to special effective dates.
